Mike Pence Jerrold Nadler , D-N.Y. called the Chris Smith bill an attack on women, and said that it would go beyond the Hyde amendment by increasing taxes on people who have health insurance that covers abortions. This bill is a new and very extreme assault on the private choices families and businesses make on their own health care. We must not be deceived into believing that this bill would simply codified existing restrictions on the use of federal funding. This is pure falsehood, Jerrold Nadler said. was excited by the prospect of Mike Pence running for governor.`` I think he's the clear front-runner, and I think the race is his if he chooses to accept it,'' Jackie Walorski said. I think he'd clear the field. Mike Pence is from Columbus and was an attorney before running unsuccessfully for Congress against Democrat Phil Sharp in 1988 and 1990. Eric Schmidt [ pictured] will step down April 4 and transition to the role of executive chairman. Co-founder Larry Page will take over as CEO. No real explanations were given although Eric Schmidt wrote in a blog post, Larry Page , Sergey and I have been talking for a long time about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making. Eric Schmidt has had a phenomal tenure. According to comScore, Google sites drove nearly 179 million unique users in November( behind only Yahoo) and Google generates 66 percent of all U.S. searches.
